124.content:
It was beautiful. That was all Vanilla could think as she studied the details of the dollhouse. Her daughter's birthday was tomorrow, and she wanted an extra-special present She had found it in a strange little pawn shop across town. It was more of a miniature mansion, really, with rooms filled with furniture and decorations so realistic that Vanilla almost wanted to live there herself. If it wasn't so small, it'd be a dream home.

Vanilla carefully stored the dollhouse in her bedroom closet. She could hardly wait to see the look on Cream's face when she received her gift. But as she was about to close the closet door, a strange feeling came over her. Her body began to tingle all over, and felt like it was slowly scrunching up. Her clothes felt like they were sliding across her skirt, and the doorknob felt oddly larger in her hand. She drew her hand up to her face, and her eyes widened. Her glove was looking looser than usual...in fact, it seemed to be getting loosed by the second. "Wh...what's happening to me?" she said worriedly. As a rational adult, Vanilla wasn't prone to jump to fanciful conclusions. But there was only one answer she could think of for this...

"I'm shrinking..." Vanilla's gaze turned to the dollhouse. "...to the size of a doll."
124.title: Vanilla's just a living doll!

Sonic was heading back to his house, wanting to talk to Tails about something that had happened earlier. Ever since early in the morning, he had been feeling very weird. Suddenly, everything began shrinking around him. "What the-!?" he yipped. Then he realized that he was growing. "Uh-oh. I gotta get home quick!" he thought as he began sprinting towards home.

Tails was in his lab, working on a small project. Abruptly, he felt the ground quake and heard heavy, loud, thudding noises coming in perfect synch with each quake. "What's going on!?" he wondered.

"Hey, Tails, I need some help out here!!!!!!" Sonic called out. He saw Tails come out of the lab and snatched him off the ground. "Tails, please, ya' gotta help me!"

"Whoa. Y-you're huge. What happened?" Tails asked timidly.

info.brief_description: Favorite Sonic characters shrink or grow!  Please Add!
info.description:
Some one in Sonic's World has just grown or shrunk. What will they do or happen to them next? You decide!

Rules:
Once shrunk or grown, it is possible for it to be permanent if you want!
Only main characters can grow or shrink
Anything else is allowed!
When adding, make sure it is at least 4 sentances. If it is too short, it will be deleted.
Please add chapters. I really would like to have some chapters that aren't my own to be on this story. Some one write a review or a chapter, please!
